text: Krzysztof Krauze (2 April 1953 - 24 December 2014) was a Polish movie director, screenwriter, photographer and cinematographer. He was best known for his 1999 thriller Debt.Marek Haltof, "Polish National Cinema", Berghahn Books, 2002 Krauze died at the age of 61 from prostate cancer on 24 December 2014 in Warsaw, Poland. ==References== ==Other websites== * *Polish news Category:1953 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Cancer deaths in Poland Category:Cinematographers Category:Deaths from prostate cancer Category:Polish photographers Category:Polish movie directors Category:Polish screenwriters Category:Writers from Warsaw
